div.pre: 446 Macedonia, c. 1917 (630) Burial: c. 280 B.C. (T) Contents: 22+ AV. Pot hoard Lysimachus: lifetime staters (all Pella) Disposition: J. P. Lawson 20; London 2 (ex Lawson); New York 2 Hill, NC 1919, pp. 9-10, illus. (2) Hill reports the staters were found with other coins "of less value." Noe (at no. 630) comments that a considerable number of these coins were in trade in Athens in 1923, indicating that the find was larger than Hill thought
